ProtectionState.description: Gets or sets the protection state.

values.name: MarkedForDeletion
values.description: Disabling protection succeeded. This is a transient state before the protected item is deleted.

values.name: InitialReplicationStatesBegin
values.description: Begin marker for initial replication states.

values.name: InitialReplicationCompletedOnPrimary
values.description: Initial replication has completed on the primary side.

values.name: InitialReplicationCompletedOnRecovery
values.description: Initial replication has completed on the recovery side.

values.name: InitialReplicationFailed
values.description: Initial replication failed and would need to be started again.

values.name: InitialReplicationStatesEnd
values.description: End marker for initial replication states.

values.name: ProtectedStatesBegin
values.description: Begin marker for protected steady-state states.

values.name: Protected
values.description: Protected item is protected and replication is on-going. Any issues with replication will be surfaced separately via the health property and will not affect the state.

values.name: ProtectedStatesEnd
values.description: End marker for protected steady-state states.

values.name: PlannedFailoverTransitionStatesBegin
values.description: Begin marker for planned failover transition states.

values.name: PlannedFailoverCompleting
values.description: Planned failover preparing protected entities is in progress.

values.name: PlannedFailoverCompleted
values.description: Planned failover has been completed successfully.

values.name: PlannedFailoverCompletionFailed
values.description: Planned failover preparing protected entities failed.

values.name: PlannedFailoverTransitionStatesEnd
values.description: End marker for planned failover transition states.

values.name: UnplannedFailoverTransitionStatesBegin
values.description: Begin marker for unplanned failover transition states.

values.name: UnplannedFailoverCompleting
values.description: Unplanned failover preparing protected entities is in progress.

values.name: UnplannedFailoverCompleted
values.description: Unplanned failover preparing protected entities is in progress.

values.name: UnplannedFailoverCompletionFailed
values.description: Unplanned failover preparing protected entities failed.

values.name: UnplannedFailoverTransitionStatesEnd
values.description: End marker for unplanned failover transition states.

values.name: CommitFailoverStatesBegin
values.description: Begin marker for commit failover states.

values.name: CommitFailoverInProgressOnPrimary
values.description: Commit failover is in progress on the primary side.

values.name: CommitFailoverInProgressOnRecovery
values.description: Commit failover is in progress on the recovery side.

values.name: CommitFailoverCompleted
values.description: Commit failover has been completed successfully.

values.name: CommitFailoverFailedOnPrimary
values.description: Commit failover failed on the primary side.

values.name: CommitFailoverFailedOnRecovery
values.description: Commit failover failed on the recovery side.

values.name: CommitFailoverStatesEnd
values.description: End marker for commit failover states.

values.name: CancelFailoverStatesBegin
values.description: Begin marker for cancel failover states.

values.name: CancelFailoverInProgressOnPrimary
values.description: Cancel failover is in progress on the primary side.

values.name: CancelFailoverInProgressOnRecovery
values.description: Cancel failover is in progress on the recovery side.

values.name: CancelFailoverFailedOnPrimary
values.description: Cancel failover failed on the primary side.

values.name: CancelFailoverFailedOnRecovery
values.description: Cancel failover failed on the recovery side.

values.name: CancelFailoverStatesEnd
values.description: End marker for cancel failover states.

values.name: ChangeRecoveryPointStatesBegin
values.description: Begin marker for change recovery point states.

values.name: ChangeRecoveryPointInitiated
values.description: Change recovery point has been initiated..

values.name: ChangeRecoveryPointCompleted
values.description: Change recovery point has been completed successfully.

values.name: ChangeRecoveryPointStatesEnd
values.description: End marker for change recovery point states.

values.name: TestFailoverCompleted
values.description: Test failover has been completed successfully.

values.name: TestFailoverCleanupInitiated

VMNicSelection.description: Gets or sets the selection type of the NIC.

values.name: SelectedByUserOverride
values.description: NIC configuration overridden by user. Differs from SelectedByUser in the sense that the legacy SelectedByUser is used both for explicit modification by user and implicit approval of user if the settings are used for TFO/FO. SelectedByUserOverride implies user overriding at least one of the configurations.
